Page.name: Ring_Gold
Page.text: Un anillo de Oro, se usa como base para otros.
2 Lingotes de Oro, 3 Esencias de Fuego

Page.name: Ring_Damage
Page.text: Usado en combate infringe 10 puntos de daño a tu
oponente, sin importar su defensa o armadura.
1 Anillo de Plata, 1 Rubí Pulido, 2 Esencias de Fuego

Page.name: Ring_Disengagement
Page.text: Usado en combate, congela a tu adversario por.
un breve periodo de tiempo, permitiéndote la
1 Anillo de Plata, 1 Zafiro Pulido, 2 Esencias de Fuego

Page.name: Ring_Power
Page.text: Infringe 50 puntos de daño a tu adversario sin
importar su nivel de defensa o armadura.
2 Piedras de Enlace, 10 Anillos de Daño,

Page.name: Ring_MDestr
Page.text: When used in combat, it removes 20 points of mana
1 Polished Emerald, 1 Silver Ring, 1 Gold Ring,
Knowledge needed: Ring of Mana Destruction

Page.name: Ring_MMDestr
Page.text: When used in combat, it removes 50 points of mana
10 Silver Rings, 50 Magic Essences, 50 Energy Essences,
Knowledge needed: Ring of Massive Mana Destruction

Page.text: 1 Lingote de Plata, 1 Medallón de Plata, 2 Esencias de Fuego

Page.name: Crown_Mana
Page.text: When worn, it increases your maximum ethereal
2 Binding Stones, 2 Enriched Magic Essences, 1 Wolfram Bar,

Page.name: Crown_Life
Page.text: When worn, it increases your maximum material
2 Binding Stones, 6 Enriched Life Essences, 1 Wolfram Bar,

Page.name: Med_Harv
Page.text: When worn while harvesting, it decreases the tool
breaking chances by 2, increases the experience
and money from random events by 10 times.
Random harvesting events can destroy it.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Gold Bars, 20 Red Toadstools,

Page.name: Med_Heaven
Page.text: When worn, if you have the hellspawn perk, instead
of hellspawning you lose the medallion.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Silver Bars, 20 White Chanterelles,

Page.name: Med_Life
Page.text: Increases your maximum material points by 30.
+2 Armor, +2 Accuracy, 5% chance to heal 25 hp
Knowledge needed: Medallion of Life Building

Page.name: Saving_Stone
Page.text: If you have this stone in inventory while mixing,
in case of critical failure you'll lose the stone
1 Refined Vegetal Mixture, 1 Mixture of Power,
